talk0048: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Hee hee...<sp:5:1:0> I'm so sorry, my darling!
talk0031:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>A floating place... A hop and a skip... *sigh*<sp:5:0:0>
Oh, Mei...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> What a pleasant surprise!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Who would have thought I'd meet
someone way up here!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Link...<sp:5:0:0> Can you think of any kind of
floating place? A...loft of sorts, perhaps?
Ugh, I do not know what I am speaking of.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>My wife, Mei, has always been the sort to
act decisively. She never needed any help
in that area.
Yet she was further inspired by King
Sidon's succession.<sp:5:0:0> She vowed to
"take the initiative just like our king."
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>She was racing all over from the moment
she awoke.<sp:5:0:0> I feel it is likely she found her
"floating place" and "hopped" there.
I...do not truly understand what I am
saying either,<sp:5:0:0> but one thing is for sure.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_01>My dear wife's impulsive actions can
sometimes cause a great deal of trouble
for our family.
*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> Where could Mei be?<sp:5:0:0> If only I had
tried to stop her before she crossed the
<clr:0000>eastern<clr:ffff> bridge...
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Hey! Did you see? Did you?!


There are fish even this high up in the
sky!<sp:5:0:0> And what's more...

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>They're hearty bass!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Just half of one would fill my stomach for
the rest of the day!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Can't you tell? I'm catching fish!


Since the sludge disappeared, I can finally
fulfill my wonderful duty of catching fish!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I was so happy to be back at it, that even
though I'm all about fishing, <sp:5:1:0>I had to
follow my heart sky high!
And look!<sp:5:0:0> Can you believe such a
wonderful fishing spot exists?!

<snd:LaughL_00>ALSO, because my body floats somehow,
I can catch fish while hopping around!
It's the best!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Fronk?!<sp:5:0:0> He's my darling! My everything!
What are you saying about sweet Fronk?

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Oh no! I completely forgot!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


This is one of those "disappearing" things 
that would worry him, isn't it?<sp:5:0:0> It is! I'm up
in the sky without telling him where I am!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I just thought I'd throw a fishy party to
celebrate King Sidon's succession...<sp:5:1:0>
So here I am, catching fish.
Is my darling mad?<sp:5:0:0> It's hard to tell
because his waters are so still, right?
Oh, how I adore my stoic love...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hm, I wonder if it's just me that he has trouble
showing his emotions to...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<snd:Think_01>I've been getting too carried away lately.
I'm almost certain he's mad.<sp:5:1:0> Poor Fronk.
I totally forgot about my darling today.
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm so sorry!<sp:5:0:0> I'll head home right away!
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Link...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>It's Mei!<sp:5:1:0> My beloved Mei has finally
returned home!

It is all thanks to you, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Thank you
so very much!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>It's hard to believe that she was on a sky
island...<sp:5:1:0> I was so worried, I couldn't eat
a bite or even drink a drop of water!
Oh, Link...<sp:5:0:0> When I saw Mei's sweet face,
her lovely head was hung in shame...

It was painfully clear<sp:5:0:0> that she had already
scolded herself terribly over this on the
way back home.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>I had no choice but to let her off the
hook and ease her concerns with a nice,
warm hug.
I'm just so happy that she's back home
safe and sound.
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>By the way...<sp:5:1:0> I tried to prepare something
for you. What do you think?
0007: I must be on my way.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>Us Zora eat fish raw, of course, <sp:5:0:0>but I
prepared this meal especially for you
as thanks!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming_01>I'm no expert, but the amount of salt I
used is spot on, if I do say so myself!
Hee hee!
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Oh! Hmm. I was planning to give you
some tasty food as thanks...

However, you're already holding on to
quite a bit.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>Come back when you've made some
space and this delicious dish is all yours!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>A floating place...<sp:5:1:0> I am sure that is what I heard,
but...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Link! Thank you so much for looking after
my beloved Mei!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Greeting_00>Link! How wonderful!<sp:5:1:0> You, ahem...heard
me talking to myself, didn't you?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>Since you are here, I must ask you
something a bit odd.

<snd:QuestionNormal_00>Have you heard anything about...
<sp:5:1:0>a floating place?
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Humming_00>♪The hearty bass is my yummy prize!
I didn't even realize! A fishing spot where
I can catch them with a hop, hop!♪
♪I know I'm getting carried away,
but I gotta fish without delaaay!♪
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkPositive_00>Here is my tale...<sp:5:0:0> When my dear wife, Mei,
went out fishing, she was singing this
mysterious song to herself...
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Humming_00>♪I found a floating place,<sp:5:0:0> where I'll catch
fish with grace!<sp:5:1:0> A hop and a skip to a
great fishing trip!♪
And with that, my wife hopped and
skipped over to the bridge in the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>
of the domain.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>At the time, I paid it no heed. She is given
to songs of fancy. But her absence has
started to weigh heavily on my mind.
talk0044: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Hee hee.<sp:5:0:0> Did you want to chat?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>A floating place... A hop and skip away...


I have never heard of such a place.


<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:Ease_00>My wife is the type to rush off in a fit of
excitement. I am worried that she will do
something rash.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Oh, my beloved Mei... I dearly hope that
she has not gone somewhere dangerous.
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Think_00>My darling...<sp:5:0:0> I'm a little surprised that
you're showing so much emotion!
You never cease to amaze!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>I was crazy about the hearty bass on the
sky island, <sp:5:0:0>but from now on I'll only be
that crazy about YOU! Just like old times!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Angry_00>Apologies for asking such a strange
question. I am just beside myself with
worry for my wife.
Knowing Mei, all is probably well.<sp:5:0:0> Yes...
it must be. It must...
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Mei...<sp:5:0:0> Despite all that we have endured,
my feelings for you have never altered.
They never shall!
There is another feeling of mine that has
also never changed. <sp:5:0:0>That is my sincerest
hope...
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>That you will never go anywhere
dangerous. Ever again, please!
